review_title: Friendly environment with a lot of support
pros: I worked for 3 months and overall I enjoyed my time there
Team of folks working there was fun. Super laid back office and common areas. Very social group after work and on weekends. Good place to make friends
cons: Public does not like you. Will shut doors in your face or tell you to f off.

review_title: Great team work, great causes and marketing
pros:
Team is passionate and great people to work with
I learned a lot the time I was there 
The company takes pride
cons:
Unionized 
Seasonal work as a canvasser 
Didn’t run into a lot of problems but 
I could do without the constant activities and group play to warm us up... it got a bit much

job_title: Door to Door Canvasser in Hamilton, ON
pros: You get to meet like minded people and work for a well known international organization.
cons: Some people don't like Greenpeace and let you know right away. Don't let it get you down, there are just as many people who love Greenpeace!

pros: The thing I really liked about Greenpeace was that the coworkers were very enthusiastic, helpful and encouraging all the time.  Also, the cause of environmental protection is amazing.
cons: I didn't like the method of fundraising that was practiced.  Also, the pay could have been a bit better considering the tasks at hand.
